item.title: Minneapolis live updates: Trump's border czar to speak in Minneapolis
item.description: The Trump administration is grappling with the fallout from the Minneapolis shooting.

item.title: WATCH: Death toll of protesters killed in Iran's bloody crackdown keeps rising
item.description: A U.N. special rapporteur has suggested more than 20,000 may have been killed.
